item.title: Bitcoin Dips on ETF Outflows
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是消极的。比特币的价格在周一跌至65000美元，ETF出现净流出，从周四的1.83亿美元下降至8,570万美元。

Bitcoin fell to $65,000 following a week showing by the ETFs on Monday with net outflows of $85.7 million, down from the $183 million on Thursday.

item.title: Bitcoin Enters Second Week of Ranging
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。比特币今天稍微下跌，触及68,200美元，但基本上仍在一周范围内，从68,000美元附近到近72,000美元。

Bitcoin has dipped a bit today, touching $68,200, but it largely remains within a week long range from $68,000 to near $72,000.

item.title: Aevo, The New Deribit on the Ethereum Blockchain
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Aevo成为首家在同一平台上提供期货和期权交易，而且全部基于区块链技术。

Aevo has become the first blockchain exchange to offer both futures and options on the same platform, and all onchain.

item.title: A Crypto Chapter Closes as Sam Bankman-Fried Gets 25 Years in Prison
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。FTX和Alameda创始人Sam Bankman-Fried因挪用80亿美元客户存款被判25年监禁，而且是在中度安全监狱服刑。

The FTX and Alameda Founder, Sam Bankman-Fried, was sentenced to 25 years in a medium-security prison for taking $8 billion worth of customer deposits.

item.title: Crypto Stocks Green, HUT up 20%, MSTR Nears $2,000
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的
比特币上涨至71,500美元，推动加密货币股票普遍上涨。

It's green across the board in crypto stocks today as bitcoin rises to $71,500 following positive inflows.

item.title: ETFs Buy $240 Million Bitcoin
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。比特币ETF继续增持，其中Cathie Wood的Ark Invest增加了2亿美元，远高于其平均水平43百万美元。

Bitcoin ETFs continued buying on Tuesday at a significant rate with Cathie Wood's Ark Invest adding $200 million, far above its average of $43 million.

item.title: El Salvador Bought $300 Million Bitcoin
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。根据萨尔瓦多总统纳伊布·布凯莱的暗示，自2021年首次购买比特币以来，萨尔瓦多已将其比特币持有量增加了五倍。

El Salvador has increased its bitcoin holdings five fold since it first bought in 2021 according to an implied statement by its president Nayib Bukele.

item.title: Bitcoin ETFs Return to Inflows
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。比特币ETF自上周以来首次回升至绿色，因为富达公司周一购买了价值2.62亿美元的比特币，相比周四仅为290万美元。

Bitcoin ETFs are back in the green for the first time since last week as Fidelity bought $262 million worth of bitcoin on Monday, up from just $2.9 million on Thursday.

item.title: Points, Points, Points, The New Ethereum Bonanza
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。虽然一开始人们认为创新在这一周期已经死亡，但随后开始逐渐涌现，就像以往的周期一样。现在，创新的势头已经开始增长。

They said innovation is dead this cycle, but then it started with a trickle, as in previous cycles, and now...

item.title: Bitcoin Retakes $69,000
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。比特币在周日开始上涨，显示价格走势和其他发展情况。

Bitcoin has started the week with a rising Sunday. We look and analyze the price action and other developments.

item.title: Ethereum’s Ratio Struggles Amid the Dip
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是消极的。文章指出，以太坊对比比特币的比率在过去两周大幅下跌，从本月初的0.06 BTC降至目前的0.051 BTC。这个下跌主要出现在最近两周，这段时间内整个加密货币市场都在下跌。

Ethereum is down to 0.051 bitcoin from starting the month near 0.06 BTC with most of the fall in the ratio being during the past two weeks when cryptos overall have fallen.

item.title: Bitcoin Recovers Despite Record Outflows
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是负面的。比特币价格回升至64000美元以上，但在亚洲交易时期下跌至60700美元，当天净资金流出达3.262亿美元。

Bitcoin is back above $64,000 at the time of writing after falling to $60,700 during Asia trading following $326.2 million in net outflows for Tuesday.

item.title: OCC Fines JPMorgan $250 Million
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。美国国家银行监督管理局（OCC）对摩根大通开出了2.5亿美元的罚款，因为该银行未能监控其银行家价值数十亿美元的交易。

The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) has issued a fine of $250 million against JP Morgan for failing to surveil billions worth of their bankers' trades.

item.title: Starknet Fees Drop to 4 Cent on Ethereum Upgrade
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。以太坊的第二层解决方案Starknet的交易费用从1美元降至仅4美分，这是在以太坊昨天升级后的结果。

Transaction fees on the ethereum second layer, Starknet, have plunged from $1 to just 4 cent after ethereum upgraded yesterday.

item.title: Bitcoin Dips After New All Time High on ETF Buying
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。比特币在欧洲交易时段开盘时下跌至71,400美元，此前差点创造新的历史最高纪录，达到73,800美元。

Bitcoin went down to $71,400 after just about making a new all time high as Europe trading hours opened earlier today, reaching $73,800.

item.title: VanEck Buys $120 Million Bitcoin, Net Inflows Top $500 Million
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。VanEck的比特币购买量大幅增加，周一达到1.188亿美元，远高于他们平均的600万美元。总体净流入量为5.05亿美元。

VanEck has seen a big jump in bitcoin buying with $118.8 million in inflows for Monday, up from their average of $6 million while overall net inflows come to $505 million.

item.title: ETF Inflows Cross All of 2021
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。根据CoinShares的研究，第一季度股票交易的比特币产品的资金流入量与2021年创纪录的整个一年相当。这表明人们对比特币产品的投资兴趣在持续增加。

Stock traded bitcoin products have seen as much inflows in the first quarter as all of the record breaking year in 2021 according to James Butterfill, Head of Research at CoinShares, a crypto asset manager.

item.title: Bitcoin Proved Itself Says Rockefeller Man
item.content:encoded:
摘要： 这些信息是积极的。洛克菲勒资本管理的国际业务负责人Ruchir Sharma表示，比特币牛市是正确的，并且出于正确的原因。

Bitcoin bulls "were right" and "for the right reasons," said Ruchir Sharma, head of Rockefeller Capital Management's international business.

item.title: Ethereum Crosses $4,000, Bitcoin Takes $72,000
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。以太坊首次突破4000美元，接近历史最高水平，比特币价格也突破了72000美元。这标志着以太坊自三年来首次达到这一价格，显示了加密货币市场的强劲表现。

Ethereum has risen above $4,000 for the first time in nearly three years with it now standing at around 20% from the all time high while bitcoin crosses $72k

item.title: Bitcoin Holds Gains as ETFs Buy Half a Billion
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。比特币进入第三天的横盘阶段，目前交易在67000美元附近，接近创纪录高位。根据周四的数据，价格区间扩大至68200美元。

Bitcoin has entered its third day of sidewaying at $67,000, just ahead of all time high, with its range increasing to $68,200 on Thursday.

item.title: German Spot ETP Now Holds Ethereum, Chainlink, Ada, Aave
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。文章指出，美国正在寻找将以太坊ETF引入股市，而欧洲正在向ATOM，MATIC，AAVE，Chainlink等加密货币进行多样化投资。

While America figures out how to get an ethereum ETF on the stock market, Europe is diversifying to cryptos like Atom, Matic, Aave, Chainlink and a lot more.

item.title: Bitcoin Sideways as ETFs Slow Down
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。
比特币过去两天一直在67000美元左右震荡，触及历史最高点67600美元后遇到阻力，并下跌至59000美元。

Bitcoin has been ranging at around $67,000 for the past two days with it facing resistance at $67,600 after touching all time high and dipping to $59,000.
